thread.section_title: Public Storage Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Public Storage | publicstorage.com | 3 of 599
thread.title: Joseph Lagana
thread.title_full: Public Storage reviewed by Joseph Lagana

author: Joseph Lagana
title: Joseph Lagana
text:
I had a very painless and enjoyable experience in securing a storage locker in Surprise AZ facility #25783.
Your representative Mr. Al Cardenas was extremely helpful; explained the contract in detail, was very courteous and friendly and was available for any questions we had. I would recommend this PS location for anyone needing storage space in Surprise AZ.
I was more than willing to place my review on Yelp, but found out I had to register for a Facebook account and I do not subscribe to that service or any other online app.
Please feel free to use my review in your marketing efforts.
